item.description: Come play some songs at the Club Passim Open Mic or just come to watch and listen. The sign-ups start at 6:30 pm and the show starts at 7. They allow for 2 songs per performer (10 minute max) and the cost to attend/play is $5. The club is attached to veggie planet if you want to grab some dinner while you listen.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a blue knit hat... Come say hello!

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Club Passim Open Mic
